Judul: Hawaii telescope gets go-ahead: Construction permit granted, but legal fight continues.
Abstrak: Hawaii’s board of land and natural resources granted a new construction permit to the Thirty Meter Telescope (TMT) on 28 September, reviving the chances that the next-generation observatory could be built on the Hawaiian mountain of Mauna Kea.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
